title: Exploring Manifest Episode 3 - "Turbulence"
author: Think Story
comment:
I love this show!!!!!!  Again the idea that they escaped death pops up.  Does the stroke have something to do with the lost years?
I am so hooked!  Thanks for having this channel so that I can talk about my favorite show this season!

Michaela stopping the maid (I don't like that term) from crashing into Evie's mother was too much narrativium for my taste - a coincidence taken too far. I could see Mick being drawn in her direction, following the "calling", but not Evie's mother.
Thanks. So far You're the best synopsis breakdown I've found.!.
Great show I wish for at least as many seasons as lost 😄
Oof you were spot on with the cult prediction
description:
Theories, easter eggs, and details you missed all explained for episode three "Turbulence" of NBC's new show, "Manifest."
